alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fairfield, northern Westchester, southeastern Orange, Putnam and Rockland Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fahnestock State Park, or near Cold Spring, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Ossining, Peekskill, Haverstraw, Mahopac, Monroe, Lake Carmel, West Point, Sherman, Brewster, Cold Spring, New Windsor, New Fairfield, Carmel and Harriman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut...and southeastern New York.
